title: (x) rounded geometric sans "jubljanska c. 83" - VAG Rounded {BJ}
content:
Dear Typophiles,   
   
This one is probably not a very new one, but anyway... It seems we haven't been introduced yet.   
   
 ![a font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023131410im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48764.gif)
author: tomzl

comments.content:
looks to me as if B.J. is on fire, today:   
 [VAG Rounded light](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023131410/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/vag-rundschrift/d-light/?PREFS_SET%5BRenderSize%5D=36&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=jubljanska+c.+83).
